FuncDef:
The statistics enable command enables QPPB statistics collection.
The undo statistics enable command disables QPPB statistics collection.
By default, QPPB statistics collection is not enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The statistics enable command is used to enable QPPB statistics collection, helping you to view statistics about packets in a CQ or a PQ on an interface.
Precautions
If QPPB statistics collection is disabled, running the display qppb local-policy statistics command fails and a message is displayed.
